nl: Prove that if a group contains exactly one element of order 2 , then that element is in the center of the group.
lean:
∀ {G : Type*} [Group G] {x : G}
  (hx : orderOf x = 2) (hx1 : ∀ y, orderOf y = 2 → y = x), x ∈ center G
candidate: ∀ {G : Type*} [Group G] {x : G} (hx : x ≠ 1) (hx' : ∀ y, y ∈ center G ∧ y ≠ 1 ↔ y = x), x ∈ center G
